pathAssistantSteps.info: The Business is closed, are a current customer, duplicate, Fraud, doesn’t need a WEX Solution.
You know the Company Name, Address, the Key Influencer (s) potential Annual Spend, Product Interest, Lead Source, Primary Campaign, and Progam (if it's a Partner Lead).

The Customer was not able to decide or is unresponsive.

Leave Stalled to retain ownership and trigger Marketing engagement.
The Lead is assigned to you, but you have no started working it yet.

You’re working on qualifying the lead.

Leave working until Stalled, Disqualified or Qualified.
